title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Master the basics of C programming language, covering variables, loops, functions, and fundamental data structures.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Delve into essential data structures like arrays, linked lists, and trees, while learning algorithmic problem-solving techniques.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Explore modern web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build responsive applications for diverse user experiences.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Delve into essential data structures like arrays, linked lists, and trees, while learning algorithmic problem-solving techniques

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Introduce yourself to the world of object-oriented programming in Python. Cover classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: Software Engineering
description: Master the core principles of software engineering, including agile methodologies, system design, and testing strategies.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Immerse yourself in the world of cloud computing and cybersecurity. Cover AWS services, encryption, and network security.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Dive into database management with MySQL. Learn to design and optimize databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Hone your problem-solving skills through a comprehensive course that covers algorithms, data structures, and coding challenges.
